name: Rising
description: On hit, after combat, deal X nonlethal damage to each foe within AoE, where X is half of the damage dealt to target foe during combat. AoE is centered on target foe, and extends two tiles in each direction that corresponds to an element of the spell used with this art: Ice=Northwest & Southeast, Fire=East & West, Lightning=North & South, Wind=Northest & Southwest.
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
